**Customer Experience (UX) & Client-Centred Design (UI) Tender**
====================================

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01014927
**Publication Date:** November 28, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** January 13, 2023 23:59:00

The Government of Canada's Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) department is soliciting proposals from qualified firms for the provision of customer experience and client-centred design (UI) services. The successful bidder will conduct annual and ad-hoc usability testing, provide design input, and A/B testing, as well as contribute to the expansion of existing programs, such as cost evaluation and journey mapping.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The scope of the engagement will include:

* Conducting usability testing on ISED's websites and tools to identify areas for improvement
* Providing design input and A/B testing to enhance the user interface and navigation
* Expanding on existing programs, such as cost evaluation and journey mapping
* Focusing primarily on task completion but also touching on other aspects of the site and tools, as applicable

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Name: Stefany Lauzon
* Email: [stefany.lauzon@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:stefany.lauzon@ised-isde.gc.ca)
* Phone: (873) 455-2186
* Address: Industry Canada, 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5, CA

**Attachments**
---------------

The tender documentation and attachments can be found on the Government of Canada's procurement website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/28/7d621cacc42bdbac5d855cea089baf39/rfp_ised-205367_-_en.pdf
